Reviews.Title: I will never purchase again from these people
Reviews.Author: Felix Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Telephone turned off after 3 days. I returned it. They gave excuse after excuse and return a piece of trash. The software was in Thai, the buttons were placed in total disorder, and due to their delay, I could not claim a refund; so I lost the money

Reviews.Title: What ?
Reviews.Author: Takehiko Sasaki
Reviews.Content: The one I ordered is New Unlocked Sony Ericsson W395i Sanrio Walkman Quadband GSM Phone. But the one I have received was Sony Ericsson Zylo. I don't know whom I can negotiate with to this thing.

Reviews.Title: Poor reception. Dropping calls
Reviews.Author: I. L. Mendez
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a new. But seens to be second hand. Can't talk with the screen closed. Because sounds like it people is talking by the speaker.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G Network
Video Calling and Video Streaming
Bluetooth and Motion Gaming support
Walkman Phone - stereo speakers and HPM-64 headset
2" display
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Sony Ericsson W395 W395i Sanrio Walkman Quadband GSM Phone with 2.0 MP Camera and Video calling (Pink) -International phone
